title: 247. Yucky
description:
Check out LIFELINE! watchlifeline.com
🎟 Catch the uncut/extended episodes ad/commercial free +1 entire bonus episode per month + Discord watchalongs & exclusive content over on Patreon: patreon.com/chrisdelia
This week, Chris discusses bedtimes, run ins with the boys in blue, and Hanka Jaaammmmmssss. Plus Missed Connections!

itunes:title: Yucky
itunes:author: Chris D'Elia
itunes:subtitle: This week Chris discusses singing in church, Easter, what he's watching, and a sleepy fashion choice he made recently. Also, the renewed life is the key.
